exceptions.exn: Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
locks_correct init_handlers

Premises:
locks_correct = fun sigma : name -> data => forall n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = n :: t : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments locks_correct _%function_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
init_handlers = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, init_handlers, _, _) as MultiParams return (name -> data) := MultiParams0 in init_handlers : forall (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams : MultiParams P), name -> data Arguments init_handlers {P MultiParams}
locks_correct_implies_mutex : forall sigma : name -> data, locks_correct sigma -> mutual_exclusion sigma
Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.lt_alt = fun n m : nat => exists p : nat, S p + n = m : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.lt_alt (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.log2_up = fun a : nat => match 1 ?= a with | Lt => S (Nat.log2 (Nat.pred a)) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments Nat.log2_up _%nat_scope
Fin.to_nat_of_nat : forall h : ?p < ?n, Fin.to_nat (Fin.of_nat_lt h) = exist (fun i : nat => i < ?n) ?p h where ?p : [num_Clients : nat |- nat] ?n : [num_Clients : nat |- nat]
adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y} where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?NameOverlayParams : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?P]
network_network_invariant_sym : forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1 where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
Nat.Even = fun n : nat => exists m : nat, n = 2 * m : nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.Even _%nat_scope
Nat.Odd = fun n : nat => exists m : nat, n = 2 * m + 1 : nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.Odd _%nat_scope
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : Fin.t m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (Fin.t n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, Fin.t m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_start : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [] where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamic_start : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> step_ordered_dynamic net net' [] where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
filter_rel : (forall x y : ?A, {?rel x y} + {~ ?rel x y}) -> ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [num_Clients : nat |- Type] ?rel : [num_Clients : nat |- Relation_Definitions.relation ?A]
state_invariant_maintained_input : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [num_Clients : nat |- Type] ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- Type]
state_invariant_maintained_deliver : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
update2 : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [num_Clients : nat |- Type] ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- Type]
collate : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> list (?A * ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [num_Clients : nat |- Type] ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- Type]
collate_ls : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [num_Clients : nat |- Type] ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- Type]
network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ps -> pSrc p = h -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = h -> network_network_invariant p p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_old : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p q : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant sigma q -> network_network_invariant p q -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') q where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
Inductive even : nat -> Prop := even_O : Even.even 0 | even_S : forall n : nat, Even.odd n -> Even.even (S n) with odd : nat -> Prop := odd_S : forall n : nat, Even.even n -> Even.odd (S n) Arguments Even.even _%nat_scope Arguments Even.even_S _%nat_scope Arguments Even.odd _%nat_scope Arguments Even.odd_S _%nat_scope
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]

Nat.divide_wd = fun (x x' : nat) (Hx : x = x') (y y' : nat) (Hy : y = y') => Morphisms.trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism RelationClasses.iff_Transitive (exists p : nat, y = p * x) (exists p : nat, y = p * x') (Morphisms_Prop.ex_iff_morphism (fun p : nat => y = p * x) (fun p : nat => y = p * x') (fun p : nat => Morphisms.per_partial_app_morphism (RelationClasses.Equivalence_PER Nat.eq_equiv) (p * x) (p * x') (Morphisms.Reflexive_partial_app_morphism Nat.mul_wd (Morphisms.reflexive_proper_proxy RelationClasses.Equivalence_Reflexive p) x x' Hx))) (exists p : nat, y' = p * x') (exists p : nat, y' = p * x') (Morphisms.eq_proper_proxy (exists p : nat, y' = p * x')) (Morphisms.trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism Relation...

Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p : Fin.t ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p)) = p where ?m : [num_Clients : nat |- nat]
FinFun.Fin2Restrict.f2n = fun (n : nat) (x : Fin.t n) => proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat x) : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> nat Arguments FinFun.Fin2Restrict.f2n {n}%nat_scope
BinNatDef.N.to_nat = fun a : N => match a with | 0%N => 0 | N.pos p => Pos.to_nat p end : N -> nat Arguments BinNatDef.N.to_nat _%N_scope
fin = fix fin (n : nat) : Type := match n with | 0 => False | S n' => option (fin n') end : nat -> Type Arguments fin _%nat_scope
Nat.max_mono : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le le) f -> forall x y : nat, Nat.max (f x) (f y) = f (Nat.max x y)
Nat.min_max_antimono : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le (Basics.flip le)) f -> forall x y : nat, Nat.min (f x) (f y) = f (Nat.max x y)
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope

step_ordered_dynamic_ind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P net net' []) ->...-> P o o0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_sind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P net net' []) ->...-> P o o0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
